metadata.purpose: Review phrase banks for Cambridge-style reviews (B2–C1).
metadata.structure: 4 paragraphs: Introduction (Hook + Factual info), Feature 1, Feature 2, Recommendation.
metadata.note: Each phrase set contains 8 items. Items 6–8 are more polished/academic for C1.

entertainment.title: Entertainment Review
entertainment.purpose: Use this structure for films, series, books, games, concerts, or other entertainment.

introduction_hook.label: Introduction - Hook
introduction_hook.purpose: Catch the reader’s attention and introduce the review topic (1–2 sentences).
phrases: Choosing a great [film/series/book/game] can be a real challenge.
With so many options out there, it’s hard to know what’s actually worth your time.
It’s easy to start a [film/series/book] that looks promising but ends up disappointing.
If you’re looking for something that will [make you laugh/keep you hooked], [title] is a strong contender.
That said, [title] stands out for more than one reason.
It is no exaggeration to say that [title] has quickly become a standout in its genre.
In an overcrowded market, [title] distinguishes itself through [feature/quality].
Few recent releases have generated as much positive attention as [title].

introduction_factual_information.label: Introduction - Factual Information
introduction_factual_information.purpose: Give brief facts: what it is, who made it, setting, plot basics, and intended audience.
phrases: Created by [director/author/studio], [title] tells the story of [main character] who [main action].
Set in [place/time], it focuses on themes such as [theme 1] and [theme 2].
The plot revolves around [central conflict], which keeps the pace moving.
With a runtime of about [time], it’s an easy watch/read that doesn’t drag.
It is aimed at anyone who enjoys [genre], especially people who like [interest].
Widely regarded as one of the strongest examples of [genre], it has attracted considerable acclaim.
Not only does it explore [theme], but it also offers an insightful perspective on [issue].
From a narrative standpoint, it is a well-constructed [genre/type] with broad appeal.

feature_1.label: Feature 1
feature_1.purpose: Describe your first main feature. Add a reason + an example/result.
phrases: The first thing that impressed me was [feature].
What really stands out is how [feature] makes the whole experience feel [adjective].
One aspect that immediately caught my attention was [detail].
This works so well because [reason].
For example, [example] shows how effective this feature is.
This is particularly impressive because it manages to [benefit] without feeling forced.
From start to finish, [feature] is handled with remarkable consistency and control.
As a result, the overall experience feels not only enjoyable but genuinely memorable.

feature_2.label: Feature 2
feature_2.purpose: Add a second key feature. You may compare/contrast or include a balanced comment.
phrases: Another feature worth mentioning is [feature].
On top of that, [feature] adds a lot of value for [audience].
Equally impressive is [feature], especially when [example].
Unlike many similar titles, this one manages to [difference].
While [minor drawback] is noticeable at times, it doesn’t ruin the overall experience.
Moreover, the way [feature] supports [effect] demonstrates real attention to detail.
Although a few moments feel [adjective], the strengths are ultimately far more convincing.
Taken together, these features explain why [title] competes so well within its genre.

recommendation.label: Recommendation
recommendation.purpose: Give your verdict, recommend to a target audience, and finish strongly.
phrases: I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend [title] to anyone who enjoys [genre].
If you’re a fan of [interest], you’ll probably love it.
This is a must for people who want something [adjective] and [adjective].
It’s worth your time because you get [benefit] from start to finish.
Overall, I’d recommend it, but it depends on whether you enjoy [condition].
All things considered, it is a highly recommendable choice for anyone seeking [quality].
Despite minor flaws, [title] delivers a consistently strong experience and is easy to endorse.
To sum up, it leaves a lasting impression—and it’s definitely worth experiencing for yourself.

places.title: Places Review
places.purpose: Use this structure for attractions, cafés, museums, shops, leisure venues, or local hotspots.

introduction_hook.label: Introduction - Hook
introduction_hook.purpose: Hook the reader and introduce the place you are reviewing.
phrases: Choosing a place to visit can be harder than it sounds.
With so many options, it’s easy to end up somewhere forgettable.
Finding a spot that’s actually worth your time isn’t always straightforward.
If you want a place that offers [benefit], [place] is well worth considering.
That said, [place] stands out for all the right reasons.
In a city full of choices, [place] offers an experience that genuinely rises above the average.
For visitors seeking [quality], [place] represents a particularly compelling option.
Few places manage to combine [quality] and [quality] as effectively as [place].

introduction_factual_information.label: Introduction - Factual Information
introduction_factual_information.purpose: Give facts: location, what it is, what it offers, who it suits.
phrases: Located in [area], [place] is well known for its [feature].
It offers [service/activity] and is popular with [locals/tourists/students].
It includes [feature 1] as well as [feature 2], so there’s plenty to do.
The atmosphere can best be described as [adjective], especially during [time].
In terms of price, it is [cheap/reasonable/expensive] compared to similar places nearby.
Widely regarded as one of the best places in [area], it has built a strong reputation.
Its appeal lies largely in its ability to cater to both [group] and [group].
Overall, it is a well-established venue that consistently attracts positive attention.

feature_1.label: Feature 1
feature_1.purpose: Describe one strong feature (atmosphere, service, design, activities).
phrases: The first thing you’ll notice is [feature].
What really stands out is [feature], which immediately creates [effect].
One aspect that impressed me was [detail].
This works particularly well because [reason].
For example, [example] shows how thoughtful the place is.
Notably, [feature] contributes to a more engaging and comfortable visitor experience.
From a practical point of view, [feature] makes the venue more accessible and enjoyable.
As a result, you’re left with the feeling that the visit was genuinely worthwhile.

feature_2.label: Feature 2
feature_2.purpose: Add another feature; optionally include a minor drawback and balance it.
phrases: Another feature worth mentioning is [feature].
On top of that, [feature] makes the visit even better.
Equally impressive is [feature], especially if you enjoy [interest].
Compared to other places in [area], this one feels [difference].
While [minor issue] can be annoying, it’s a small price to pay for [benefit].
Furthermore, the consistency of [feature] suggests a clear commitment to quality.
Although it can get [adjective] at times, the overall experience remains highly positive.
Taken together, these elements help explain why it has become such a popular destination.

recommendation.label: Recommendation
recommendation.purpose: Recommend clearly and target the right audience.
phrases: I’d highly recommend [place] to anyone interested in [interest].
If you’re looking for [goal], you genuinely can’t go wrong here.
It’s worth the money because you get [benefit].
This is a must-visit for [audience], especially on [occasion].
Overall, I’d recommend it, but it depends on whether you like [condition].
All things considered, it is an excellent choice for those who value [quality].
Even allowing for minor drawbacks, the venue offers strong value and a memorable experience.
To sum up, it’s the kind of place you’ll want to recommend to others afterwards.

products.purpose: Use this structure for gadgets, apps, clothes, equipment, or useful items.

It’s easy to waste money on something that looks good but disappoints.
If you want a [product] that actually delivers, [product name] is worth considering.
That said, [product name] stands out from many alternatives.

introduction_factual_information.label: Introduction - Factual Information
introduction_factual_information.purpose: Give facts: brand, what it does, price range, who it’s for.
phrases: Designed by [brand], [product name] is aimed at users who want [benefit].
It offers [feature 1] and includes [feature 2], making it practical for [audience].
Available in [versions/colours], it suits different preferences.

In short, it is a well-positioned product for anyone seeking [benefit] without unnecessary extras.

feature_1.label: Feature 1
feature_1.purpose: Describe one key feature and explain why it matters.
phrases: The most striking feature is [feature].
What really stands out is how [feature] makes [task] easier.
One thing that impressed me was [detail].
This works well because [reason].
For example, [example] shows how practical it is in everyday use.

As a result, the product feels both reliable and well thought out.

feature_2.label: Feature 2
feature_2.purpose: Add another feature; compare or mention a limitation and balance it.
phrases: Another feature worth highlighting is [feature].
In addition, [feature] adds real value for [audience].
Equally impressive is [feature], especially when you [use case].
Unlike many cheaper alternatives, this one [difference].
While [minor drawback] exists, it’s not a deal-breaker.
Moreover, the attention to [detail] suggests a higher overall standard of build quality.
Although it may not suit those who need [condition], it performs strongly in its intended role.

recommendation.label: Recommendation
recommendation.purpose: Recommend clearly, with value and a strong closing line.
phrases: I’d definitely recommend [product name] to anyone who wants [goal].
If you need [benefit], this is a safe choice.
It’s worth the money because it offers [value].
This is a must for people who [use case].
Overall, I’d recommend it, but it depends on whether you care about [condition].
All things considered, it represents excellent value for users seeking [quality].
Despite a few minor limitations, it delivers on its promises and is easy to recommend.
To sum up, it’s a strong option that most buyers are unlikely to regret.

Some experiences look great online but aren’t worth it in real life.
